activeModeIteration() - Method in class de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.ConnectionWatch
This runs a single iteration of the active mode:
Check whether the client answered within ConnectionWatch.MAXIMUM_CLIENT_RESPONSE_DELAYms if it did, send next ConnectionAliveCheck if not, notify ConnectionWatch.mTimeoutListener
